ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Code Terminology Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Terminology associated with the tumor response assessment test code codelist of the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM)._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the clinical performance, as measured by a rating or scale, as a condition of disease response to therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the clinical performance, as measured by a rating or scale, as a condition of disease response to therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the anatomic response (based on changes in size of anatomic structures) of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the anatomic response (based on changes in size of anatomic structures) of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The most clinically favorable response recorded from the start of the study treatment until the end of treatment.

Concepts.definition: The most clinically favorable response recorded from the start of the study treatment until the end of treatment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether disease is present in the bone marrow.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether disease is present in the bone marrow.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the bone response of a disease to a therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the bone response of a disease to a therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the cytogenetic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the cytogenetic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether disease recurrence occurred.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether disease recurrence occurred.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the involved liver.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the involved liver.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the metabolic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the metabolic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether a malignancy has appeared at sites distant to the primary site of disease.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether a malignancy has appeared at sites distant to the primary site of disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the minimal residual disease response to therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the minimal residual disease response to therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the molecular response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the molecular response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the morphologic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the morphologic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether a lesion is newly identified, in comparison to a previous timepoint.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether a lesion is newly identified, in comparison to a previous timepoint.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the equivocality of disease progression based on a newly identified lesion.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the equivocality of disease progression based on a newly identified lesion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether a previously identified new lesion(s) is showing signs of worsening.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether a previously identified new lesion(s) is showing signs of worsening.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target enhancing lesion.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target enhancing lesion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether a non-target lesion is showing signs of worsening.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether a non-target lesion is showing signs of worsening.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target non-enhancing lesion.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target non-enhancing lesion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A qualitative or quantitative measurement of the response of a non-target tumor(s) to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative measurement of the response of a non-target lesion(s) to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the pathologic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the pathologic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the radiologic response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the radiologic response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the soft tissue response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the soft tissue response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the involved spleen.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the involved spleen.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of steroid usage as a condition of disease response to therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of steroid usage as a condition of disease response to therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A global deterioration of health status providing evidence of disease progression not covered by disease response criteria (eg. RECIST).

Concepts.definition: A global deterioration of health status providing evidence of disease progression not covered by disease response criteria (eg. RECIST).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A qualitative or quantitative measurement of the response of a target tumor(s) to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative measurement of the response of a target lesion(s) to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An evaluation of the tumor marker response of the disease to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An evaluation of the tumor marker response of the disease to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether the subject has minimal residual disease.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether the subject has minimal residual disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether minor pathological response occurred.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether minor pathological response occurred.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether major pathological response occurred.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether major pathological response occurred.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The response of the bone marrow to the treatment.

Concepts.definition: The response of the bone marrow to the treatment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the response of a target nodal lesion(s) to the therapy.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the response of a target nodal lesion(s) to the therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on circulating lymphocyte count.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on circulating lymphocyte count.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on platelet count.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on platelet count.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on hemoglobin measurement.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of the disease response to therapy based on hemoglobin measurement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An improvement in one or more hematologic cell counts.

Concepts.definition: An improvement in one or more hematologic cell counts.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A group of symptoms that affect an individual's general well being. Representative examples include fever, chills, fatigue, weakness, and weight loss.

Concepts.definition: A group of symptoms that affect an individual's general well being. Representative examples include fever, chills, fatigue, weakness, and weight loss.
